data.content:
noun
plural -das
[count] :a Mexican food that consists of a flat piece of bread (called a tortilla) that is rolled around a meat, bean, or cheese filling and covered with a sauce
the big enchilada
US informal :the most important issue, person, etc.
She's won many awards for her writing in the past, but this one is the big enchilada.
the whole enchilada
US informal :the entire thing :everything
The celebration included music, food, fireworksthe whole enchilada.
The team may win the whole enchilada [=the championship] this year.
